data.message: Facebook shares do not reach the people on my friends list. It sucks. 👎

replies.message: Hi Emil. We're sorry you're experiencing this. We want to help solve the problem as quickly as possible. You can learn how to report the issue here: http://bit.ly/2zlwIpO. -Tenaya

The general problem is not perceived as a problem. I know we can even share our site normally. He's reaching out to everyone. I think facebook quality is falling as these problems grow. Facebook seems to have no respect for its users.
why do I not have the "invite" button on all my business pages ?  some have it and some do not ?  any one know ?
